# ğŸ“„ Description

### What is this project? ğŸ“

- This project is a simple recipe application, where you can search for recipes by name, category or ingredient. You can also save your favorite recipes.

# ğŸš€ Technologies

This project was developed with the following technologies:

### React Native ğŸ“

### Expo ğŸ“

### json-server ğŸ“

### Axios ğŸ“

### Vector Icons ğŸ“

### React Navigation ğŸ“

### React Native Gesture Handler ğŸ“

How to run:

```bash

# Clone Repository

$ git clone

# Go to folder

$ cd recipes

# Install Dependencies

$ npm install

# Run Aplication

$ npx expo start

# Run Server

$ json-server --watch -d 180 --host <IPv4:port> db.json

```
